relation: My main entry to the 2007 Halloween Funfest. Acrylics on eight canvases. The total size of the actual painting is 32x20" (to get an idea of the size, here's a picture of it in early development: http://starmen.net/forum/?t=getfile&id=36529&private=0 ) As the largest single art project I have ever done, from start to finish, well over 60 hours of work were put into this painting. If you'd like to see a larger version, drop me an e-mail.

I painted this for Stevesesy as a way of saying "thanks" for lending me Mother 3. In case you don't recognize it: http://starmen.net/vote/vote.php?id=1763 Yeah, it's silly, but I had fun making it anyway. I thought it was a hoot.

The idea here was Tomato's, from the EB Art Idea Factory topic in the forums. More or less, it's supposed to be a cross of EarthBound's Caveboy from Stonehenge, Saturday Night Live's "Unfrozen Caveman Lawyer" (played by the late Phil Hartman), and Phoenix Wright. It was made by badly tracing and modifying a Phoenix Wright screenshot. Tomato's words, which made this possible: "Cave Boy as SNL's Unfrozen Caveman Lawyer, in Phoenix Wright style, but using his usual "I'm just a simple caveman" speech."
A commissioned painting of the good Dr. Andonuts. Acrylics on 9"x12" canvas board.
Submission for the Envelope Art part of the 2007 EB Siege.
textBeforeTable: > 9 8 7 5 1 0 < Other Submissions by ozwalled For an experimental effect, I added a glossy layer to the sunglasses such that when the painting is hanging on the wall of my apartment, and you're looking at it from a few feet away or more, my livingroom's light is reflecting off the glasses, obscuring the Giygas pattern. When you get closer to it though, your shadow casts onto the painting, canceling the reflection and revealing the Giygas images on the lenses. Each of the lenses is about the size of a quarter. A (bad) picture of the lenses reflecting can be seen here: http://starmen.net/forum/?t=getfile&id=36511&private=0 The 'Zombie Chick' from Threed. This image has been resized for your convenience. Click on it to view the full size version. Zombie Chick: Minion of Giygas Zombie Chick: Minion of Giygas - by ozwalled  Mother2
